item.description: SINGLES WALK AND LUNCH at Sessions Woods in Burlington at 11 am. This is a beautiful place with streams, a beaver dam, and a waterfall. Join us for a great day outdoors in the sunshine. Afterward, we?ll go for lunch at a local restaurant. No charge for walk. For info, call Gail 860-582-8229. Directions to walk: I 84W Exit 38 (Rt. 6 Bristol), go about 9 miles (pass Home Depot, several small malls, Stop & Shop, then Blockbuster), at RR tracks, turn right onto Burlington Ave. (Rt. 69), continue on Burlington Ave. for 3.7 miles, turn left at the sign for Sessions Woods Wildlife Area. Go up hill, park on left.
item.how_to_find_us: Soneone will be holding a Social Connections sign in the parking lot.
item.why: You'll love it because we offer a relaxed, comfortable, welcoming atmosphere for you and other singles to socialize and have fun!

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Walk & Lunch
